name: Clear World
text: During each of your End Phases, pay 500 Life Points or destroy this card. Each player receives effects, depending on the monster Attributes they control. ? LIGHT: Play with your hand revealed at all times. ? DARK: If you control 2 or more monsters, you cannot declare an attack. ? EARTH: During your Standby Phase: Target 1 face-up Defense Position monster you control; destroy that target. ? WATER: During your End Phase: Discard 1 card. ? FIRE: During your End Phase: Take 1000 damage. ? WIND: You must pay 500 Life Points to activate a Spell Card.
